gaming products (part 1).description: Consoles and computers (curated, referenced). Part 1 covers up to 2011.

commands.name: /gaming product
commands.description: Shows a random gaming product with release year, short intro, image (if available), and sources (Part 1 â‰¤ 2011).

commands.name: /gaming year_part1
commands.description: Lists products released in a given year (Part 1: up to 2011). If no year is provided, shows a summary by year.

gaming products (part 2).description: Modern consoles and computers (curated, referenced). Part 2 covers 2012+.

commands.name: /gaming product_part2
commands.description: Shows a random modern gaming product (Part 2: 2012+).

gaming timeline.description: Decade-based timeline of major games, consoles, and computers (curated).

commands.name: /gaming timeline
commands.description: Shows timeline entries by decade (e.g., 1980s). If no decade is provided, lists available decades.
